  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_83290</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_83290</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">Ombres observées de la lumière passant par un obstacle  ou un intervalle</string>
            <string language="en">Shadows observed from light passing through an obstacle or a gap</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Schatten beobachtet vom Licht, das durch ein 
Hindernis oder einen Abstand überschreitet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sombras observadas da luz que passa com um 
obstáculo ou uma abertura</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ombre osservate da luce che passa con un ostacolo 
o uno spacco</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σκιές που παρατηρούνται από το φως που περνά μέσω 
ενός εμποδίου ή ενός χάσματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sombras observadas de la luz que pasa con un 
obstáculo o un boquete</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Seconde sur deux illustrations montrant  l'ombre observée quand la lumière traverse un obstacle ou un intervalle. Ici, on a observé des ombres quand la lumière traverse un espace.</string>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations showing shadow observed when light passes through an obstacle or a gap. Here, shadows were observed when light pass through a gap.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">intervalle</string>
            <string language="en">gap</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">vagues de lumière</string>
            <string language="en">light waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">objets opaques</string>
            <string language="en">opaque objects</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ombres</string>
            <string language="en">shadows</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">longueur d'onde</string>
            <string language="en">wavelength</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen beobachtete
das Zeigen des Schattens, wann Licht durch ein Hindernis oder einen 
Abstand überschreitet. Hier wurden Schatten beobachtet, als 
hell, überschreiten durch einen Abstand.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações mostrar a sombra 
observou quando a luz passa com um obstáculo ou uma abertura. 
Aqui, as sombras foram observadas quando claras passam com uma 
abertura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni mostrare 
l'ombra ha osservato quando la luce attraversa un ostacolo o uno 
spacco. Qui, le ombre sono state osservate una volta chiare 
attraversano uno spacco.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν σκιά 
παρατήρησε πότε το φως περνά μέσω ενός εμποδίου ή ενός 
χάσματος. Εδώ, οι σκιές παρατηρήθηκαν όταν ελαφρύ πέρασμα
μέσω ενός χάσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones mostrar la 
sombra observó cuando la luz pasa con un obstáculo o un boquete. 
Aquí, las sombras fueron observadas cuando son ligeras pasan 
con un boquete.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lichtwellen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
